sentences.sentence: After SOT The days of cheap, low quality, mass-produced German wines are numbered.
sentences.translation: 过去那些出售大批廉价，低质德国红酒的日子已经过去。

sentences.sentence: After SOT If they can deliver tonight, a quarter-final place awaits for el Nino and his amigos.
sentences.translation: 如果他们今晚能够顺利晋级，四分之一决赛将会等待着“厄尔尼诺”和他的朋友们。

sentences.sentence: These amplifiers are available in small package options (SOT-23) as well as the MSOP and the industry-standard SO packages.
sentences.translation: 这些放大器采用小型封装选择(采用SOT - 23)以及MSOP和行业标准的SO封装。
